item.title: The NFL Pick 10: Build a team with any 10 players -- here's who 55 experts picked
item.description: We asked our experts to play general manager and build a team around any 10 players for the next three seasons. Here are the results.

item.title: Reds-Pirates brawl results in 40 games of bans
item.description: Six players and both managers have been suspended by Major League Baseball for their roles in Tuesday's benches-clearing brawl between the Reds and Pirates.

item.title: Griffin: Building around LeBron was 'miserable'
item.description: Pelicans executive vice president David Griffin told Sports Illustrated that the annual challenge of building a title contender in Cleveland around LeBron James was too stressful, even if it did result in a championship in 2016.

item.title: Saints' Thomas looks to 'earn every penny' of deal
item.description: Saints wide receiver Michael Thomas said Thursday that his goal is to earn every penny of the record-setting contract extension he signed a day earlier. Thomas practiced with the team for the first time this preseason on Thursday.

item.title: Pro Bowl center Ryan Kalil unretires to join Jets
item.description: Veteran center Ryan Kalil is coming out of retirement and has agreed to a one-year contract with the Jets.

item.title: Gordon's agent requests Chargers trade star RB
item.description: Agent Damarius Bilbo told ESPN's Josina Anderson that he requested a trade for client Melvin Gordon from the Chargers last week, as a stalemate remains in contract talks.

item.title: Ashley Wagner: Coughlin sexually assaulted me
item.description: Olympic bronze medalist Ashley Wagner says she was 17 when John Coughlin, then 22, sexually assaulted her after a party in June 2008.

item.title: 44 years. 41 molestation allegations. How the past caught up to a former Olympian
item.description: A 13-month reporting effort by Outside the Lines uncovered 41 allegations of molestation against Conrad Mainwaring, a 1976 Olympian and former coach of a two-time gold medalist.

item.title: 'You can't plan beyond next year': Coaching in an NBA where stars call the shots
item.description: Superstars have reshaped the landscape of the NBA this offseason, and head coaches must continue to adapt.

item.title: Inside the Zack Greinke deal: 24 hours that rocked the MLB trade deadline
item.description: As the clock ticked toward 4 p.m., the deal that would soon send shock waves across baseball still seemed so unlikely that Greinke took the mound at Yankee Stadium. Here's how the ace started July 31 a D-back and ended it an Astro.

item.title: Winners and losers of an unexpectedly wild MLB trade deadline
item.description: Remember that talk about a boring deadline? Well, let's just say things went a little crazy before the dealing stopped. Here's who scored (hint: the Astros!) and struck out (sorry, Yankees) when the dust settled.

item.title: Champ Bailey: The play that defined his Hall of Fame career
item.description: Bailey, who will be enshrined in the Pro Football Hall of Fame, has an elite body of work. But on Jan. 14, 2006, an interception against the Patriots became his career's defining moment.

item.title: Austin Hooper soaking up wisdom from Hall of Famer Tony Gonzalez
item.description: Gonzalez, who will be enshrined in Canton on Saturday, shared some tips with Hooper, the Falcons' best tight end receiving threat since Gonzalez retired.

item.title: Best of Thursday at NFL training camps -- Melvin Gordon wants trade; Ryan Kalil returning with Jets
item.description: Gordon wants out. Kalil wanted back in. Check out the top photos, videos, quotes and notes from the NFL on Thursday.

item.title: Mike Trout tracker, July edition: He's now better than eight more Hall of Famers
item.description: Mike Trout -- still just 27 years old -- continued to move up the ranks of the all-time greats this past month. Here's why passing Barry Larkin and other legends is so impressive -- and how he has done it.

item.title: The top 25 remaining players in the 2019 TBT
item.description: The 2019 TBT is down to eight teams, but it remains rich in former college stars and NBA contributors. Here are the top remaining standouts.

item.title: Viewers guide: Can Robbie Lawler stop Colby Covington's hunt for a title shot?
item.description: Covington won an interim UFC title last year, but was passed over for a shot at the real welterweight belt. He has been promised an opportunity if he can beat Lawler on Saturday.

item.title: Why Covington's takedown ability will set the tone against Lawler
item.description: Colby Covington will need to increase his striking volume and use his wrestling to negate the knockout power of Robbie Lawler on Saturday.

item.title: Is Evan Engram worthy of inclusion in top tier at tight end?
item.description: One look at average draft position at tight end would tell you there is a Big Three and then everyone else. We examine whether the Giants tight end should be mentioned in that group this season.

item.title: How to draft your fantasy football team the Matthew Berry way
item.description: Berry explains how to build and manage a winning fantasy football team by taking a weekly approach, loading up on backs and receivers and waiting on QB.

item.title: Professional wrestler Harley Race dies at 76
item.description: Eight-time NWA world champion and WWE Hall of Famer Harley Race died Thursday at the age of 76.

item.title: The Senators are violating the spirit of the CBA
item.description: By taking on eight figures in cap space on injured players who will never skate for the club, Ottawa is doing wrong by its long-suffering fans.

item.title: Premier League's worst transfer deadline day deals: Torres, Carroll top the list
item.description: With summer 2019's transfer deadline day fast approaching in England, we decided to look back at some of the worst deals. (Look away, Chelsea fans.)

item.title: Deserving Josef Martinez, Carles Gil among those snubbed in MLS fan vote
item.description: The MLS All-Star fan vote results were mixed, as they got some dead on but missed on others. Here's the true "Best XI" from the season's first half.

item.title: Wondolowski, Rimando make lasting All-Star memories as their careers near their end
item.description: There was no storybook ending, but elder statesman Chris Wondolowski and the retiring Nick Rimando made the most of their MLS All-Star experiences.

item.title: Sparks holding their own as WNBA heads to home stretch
item.description: The Ogwumike sisters and Chelsea Gray have kept Los Angeles in the hunt, and players returning from injury should be a boost for the Sparks.

item.title: In his words: Chris Arreola's five best moments in the boxing ring
item.description: Chris Arreola is a heavyweight fighter who competed at the highest level of the sport, and while world titles remained just out of reach, he gave fans their money's worth in terms of entertainment.

item.title: Breaking down the PFL lightweight and featherweight playoff brackets
item.description: The bracket for the PFL's lightweight and featherweight divisions are now set. How could the postseason play out? We break down every matchup.

item.title: Mercedes explains Hamilton's 50-second stop
item.description: Mercedes has given details on why one of Lewis Hamilton's pit stops took more than 50 seconds to complete at the German Grand Prix last weekend.
